It's addressed with tf.nn.fused_batch_norm
…
On Nov 27, 2016 4:37 AM, "Edgar Y. Walker" ***@***.***> wrote: Indeed I'm observing nan values from tensorflow.contrib.slim.batch_norm due to negative variances returned from tf.nn.moments. body:
It's addressed with tf.nn.fused_batch_norm

On Nov 27, 2016 4:37 AM, "Edgar Y. Walker" <notifications@github.com> wrote:

> Indeed I'm observing nan values from tensorflow.contrib.slim.batch_norm
> due to negative variances returned from tf.nn.moments. Looking forward to
> seeing this addressed.
>
